title: Show notification about offline status when peercount is 0

milestone.title: 1.28.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
## OOBE (out of the box experience) 

- Restart OOBE development

- Work with design to scope and prioritise the OOBE development to be done during this cycle

 

## Messaging & Communities

*Priorities In priority order:*

**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 1.27 cycle**

**2. Fix bugs, both functional and UX fit-and-finish defects.**  

- Aim to finish fixing all issues tagged with "E:Design Feedback 1.25" and "E:Design Feedback 1.25".  This is because the 'Mobile UI fit and finish" co-working event will happen right after the 1.28 release, and to get maximum value from this event it would be great if all currently identified UI defects were closed before hand.

- Use https://status.app/insights/epics/E:Design%20Feedback%201.25 and https://status.app/insights/epics/E:Design%20Feedback%201.24 to get view all of these UI defect issues, and how we are tracking on closing them.

- Focus on bugs related Status Desktop interop with ad-hoc group chat functionality and Communities functionality, and specifically any bugs related to Status Community individual channel token gating.  

- Any other bugs and quality defects.

**DON'T BUILD NEW COMMUNITIES OR MESSANGING FUNCTIONALITY, FOCUS IN ON FIXING BUGS AND COMPLETING LOOSE ENDS RELATED TO FUNCTIONALITY THAT'S ALREADY BEEN BUILT BUT IS NOT QUITE COMPLETE**  

 

## Wallet

**1. Continue building out Mobile Wallet MVP main screens**

- By 'main screens', referring to all flows and screens in the Wallet section, excluding Wallet settings screens

body:
Related [comment](https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/4459#issuecomment-1912040318)

If peer count == 0 in fact it means that user is effectively offline. In such case we should show something that indicates to the user that messages are not going to be sent. 

We need input from @status-im/design-team on that as I haven't found related designs in Figma. 


### Additional Information

- Status version: nightly 
- Operating System: Android, iOS
